name: Agent Hook
description:
Agent Hook! An agent with a grappling hook, set out to recover a golf cart worth 1 Million $!

What could go wrong?

`This is a solo project`

`The game was heavily scoped down due to time constraints and the fact that I was sick for the entirety of the first day`

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
Space - Jump
W/D or Arrows: Move on hook
Left Click: Shoot Hook
Right Click: Release hook
R - Restart Level

Made for the Mix and Game Jam!

Inspired from: 

- Just Cause/Countless other games featuring Grappling Hooks

- Jazzpunk

- One Hit Death Mechanic from Hotline Miami
